sentences.sContent: Caroline was very much a prude. She wouldn't let me see her naked.
sentences.sCn: 卡罗琳是个过于一本正经的人。她不肯让我看到她的裸体。

remMethod.val: pr(＝pro 向前) + ud(＝vid 看) ＋ e → 事先看 → 拘守礼仪的人

words.tran: 假正经的行为；过分拘谨的言行

trans.tranCn: 装成规矩的女人, (尤指在性问题上)故做正经的女人
trans.tranOther: If you call someone a prude, you mean that they are too easily shocked by things relating to sex
